title: Card Enhanced
description: An Enhanced card with POI and suitable for in grid content

image.title: Image
image.description: Image to show in the snippet

textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
textAlignment.description: left, right, or center text alignment

verticalAlignment.title: Vertical Text Alignment
verticalAlignment.description: top, middle, or bottom text alignment

linkPosition.title: Position Link with card text
linkPosition.description: place link with the card text OR below the image. Text Alignment still applies

blend.title: Text Blending
blend.description: Blending option for text over image
